entry.string: If this is your first visit to this part of your Xaraya site, please take a minute to read through the following introduction, in order to explore the different possibilities offered by the Contact module.
entry.translation: Iff thees is yuoor furst feesit tu thees pert ooff yuoor Xereya seete-a, pleese-a teke-a a meenoote-a tu reed thruoogh zee fullooeeng intrudoocshun, in oorder tu ixplure-a zee deefffferent pusseebilities ooffffered by zee Cuntect mudoole-a.

entry.string: "The Messages module gives your users a way to send messages to another users inbox."
entry.translation: "Zee Messeges mudoole-a geefes yuoor users a vey tu send messeges tu unuzeer users inbux."

entry.string: "You must be logged into the site before you can send messages. Select Messages from the user menu and select a user from the drop down list to send your message too. Compose your message and select the send button."
entry.translation: "Yuoo moost be-a lugged intu zee seete-a beffure-a yuoo cun send messeges. Um gesh dee bork, bork! Select Messeges frum zee user menoo und select a user frum zee drup doon leest tu send yuoor messege-a tuu. Cumpuse-a yuoor messege-a und select zee send boottun. Bork bork bork!"

entry.string: "From the Admin menu you can specify the support of short urls for the messages module."
entry.translation: "Frum zee Edmeen menoo yuoo cun speceeffy zee sooppurt ooff shurt urls fur zee messeges mudoole-a."

entry.string: The Messages Module has one block included at this time.
entry.translation: Zee Messeges Mudoole-a hes oone-a bluck inclooded et thees teeme-a.

entry.string: newmessages -> Display's a block that lists any new unread messages for the user with a link to the view messages page.'
entry.translation: noomesseges -> Deespley's a bluck thet leests uny noo unreed messeges fur zee user veet a leenk tu zee feeoo messeges pege-a.'
